metadata.name: Triple Cross eBPF Rootkit Default LockFile
metadata.comment: Detects the creation of the file "rootlog" which is used by the TripleCross rootkit as a way to check if the backdoor is already running.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND lower(file.path) = lower('/tmp/rootlog'))

output.summary: Detects the creation of the file "rootlog" which is used by the TripleCross rootkit as a way to check if the backdoor is already running.
